titles.title: An original resolution to provide additional funding for the Select Committee on Indian Affairs Special Committee on Investigations.

calendar.text: Committee on Indian Affairs ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Inouye. With written report No. 100-510.
Referred to the Committee on Rules.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Ford without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 978.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/15/1988--Introduced. Amends Senate Resolution 381, 100th Congress, to increase the authorized expenditures of the Select Committee on Indian Affairs.
